quote_last:
, and I got to be home by—”
“Oh, shut up,” says I. “I had an appointment as chief performer at an inquest at seven, and I’m not kicking about not keeping it.”
title: Roads of Destiny
author: O. Henry

title: The Hot Rock
author: Donald E Westlake
